name: Smashy Cars Police Chase Simulator
description:
Escape the Police,Swat, Robo Cop, Dino Cop, Balloon Police and Snowman Cop
Select funny vehicles,race through dessert, airport, military base, farm and City.
Collect hamburgers and buy new funny vehicles.

80 unlockable vehicles
Fantastic visuals and music
Different locations
funny and humorous vehicles like BANANA CAR, and TOILET CAR
